pages.privacy-policy: WagerWorld Privacy Policy - How We Protect Your Personal Data and Privacy WagerWorld Home Casino Numbers Facilities Service Luxury Privacy Policy Data retention We will only retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes we collected it for, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements. To determine the appropriate retention period for personal data, we consider the amount, nature, and sensitivity of the personal data, the potential risk of harm from unauthorized use or disclosure of your personal data, the purposes for which we process your personal data and whether we can achieve those purposes through other means, and the applicable legal requirements. In some circumstances, we may anonymize your personal data (so that it can no longer be associated with you) for research or statistical purposes, in which case we may use this information indefinitely without further notice to you. Security We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used or accessed in an unauthorized way, altered or disclosed. In addition, we limit access to your personal data to those employees, agents, contractors and other third parties who have a business need to know. They will only process your personal data on our instructions and they are subject to a duty of confidentiality. We have put in place procedures to deal with any suspected personal data breach and will notify you and any applicable regulator of a breach where we are legally required to do so. Children's privacy Our website is not intended for children under the age of 18 and we do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If you are under the age of 18, please do not use our website or provide any personal data to us. If we become aware that we have collected personal data from a child under the age of 18, we will take steps to delete the information as soon as possible. Conclusion We are committed to protecting your privacy and maintaining the security of any personal information received from you. We strictly adhere to the requirements of the data protection legislation in the UK. If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at wagerworld@gmail.com. We will do our best to address your concerns and ensure that your personal data is handled in accordance with this Privacy Policy and applicable law. Thank you for choosing WagerWorld. We look forward to providing you with an exceptional gaming and hotel experience. WagerWorld WagerWorld Casino & Hotel – Where luxury meets excitement. © 2024 WagerWorld. All rights reserved. Gamble responsibly. pages.terms-conditions: WagerWorld Terms of Use - Rules, Regulations, and Conditions for Using Our Casino & Hotel Services WagerWorld Home Casino Numbers Facilities Service Luxury Terms of Use Responsible Gaming WagerWorld is committed to promoting responsible gaming. We encourage our users to gamble responsibly and to seek help if they have a gambling problem. We reserve the right to exclude any user from our services if we believe that they have a gambling problem or are engaging in irresponsible gambling behavior. Account Security You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your computer. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password. If you have reason to believe that your account is no longer secure (for example, in the event of a loss, theft, or unauthorized disclosure of your password), you should immediately notify WagerWorld at wagerworld@gmail.com. Payment and Billing You agree to pay all fees and charges incurred in connection with your use of WagerWorld's services. All payments must be made in the currency specified by WagerWorld. You authorize WagerWorld to charge your chosen payment method for any fees or charges incurred. If your payment method is declined or rejected, WagerWorld may suspend or terminate your account. Third-Party Links WagerWorld may provide links to third-party websites or resources. You acknowledge and agree that WagerWorld is not responsible for the availability, accuracy, or content of such websites or resources. You further acknowledge and agree that WagerWorld shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with the use of or reliance on any such content, goods, or services available on or through any such website or resource. Termination WagerWorld may terminate or suspend your access to our website or services at any time, with or without cause, and with or without notice. Upon termination, your right to use our website or services will immediately cease. Any fees or charges incurred prior to termination shall remain due and payable. Indemnification You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless WagerWorld, its affiliates, directors, officers, employees, and agents from and against any and all claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs, or debt, and expenses (including but not limited to attorney's fees) arising from or in connection with your use of our website or services, your violation of these Terms of Use, or your violation of any rights of another. pages.disclaimer: WagerWorld Disclaimer - Important Information and Legal Disclaimers for Our Casino & Hotel WagerWorld Home Casino Numbers Facilities Service Luxury Disclaimer We take your privacy and security seriously at WagerWorld. We are committed to protecting your personal information and complying with all applicable data protection laws and regulations. Our website may use cookies to enhance your experience and provide personalized content and advertisements. By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies. You may disable cookies in your browser settings, but please note that some features of our website may not function properly without cookies. We may collect personal information from you when you use our website or services, such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment information. We use this information to provide you with our services, process your transactions, and communicate with you. We may also use your personal information to send you promotional materials and updates about our services. We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your personal information with our service providers, such as payment processors, marketing agencies, and data analytics providers, to help us provide our services and improve our website. We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no security measures can guarantee 100% protection, and we cannot guarantee the security of your personal information. You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information that we have collected. You may also object to the processing of your personal information or request that we restrict the processing of your personal information. To exercise these rights, please contact us at wagerworld@gmail.com. We may retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 18. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under the age of 18, we will take reasonable steps to delete such information. Our website may contain social media features, such as Facebook and Twitter buttons, that allow you to share our content on your social media profiles. These features may collect your IP address and other personal information. Your interactions with these features are governed by the privacy policies of the respective social media platforms.
